headline.main: Analytics: How Readers Reacted to Our Article About Hybrid Species

docs.snippet: Moises Velasquez-Manoff’s article about the rise of hybrid species prompted a debate among readers about whether this was good for the environment. Here’s what they said....
docs.abstract: Moises Velasquez-Manoff’s article about the rise of hybrid species prompted a debate among readers about whether this was good for the environment. Here’s what they said.

headline.print_headline: EU Wields Russia Sanctions Threat but Timing Vague
headline.main: EU Wields Russia Sanctions Threat but Timing Vague

docs.snippet: The European Union threatened Russia with new trade sanctions if Moscow fails to start reversing its action in Ukraine, but sharp divisions among leaders at a summit in Brussels left the timing of any measures uncertain....
docs.lead_paragraph: The European Union threatened Russia with new trade sanctions if Moscow fails to start reversing its action in Ukraine, but sharp divisions among leaders at a summit in Brussels left the timing of any measures uncertain.

headline.print_headline: President Says Hundreds of Foreign Tanks in Ukraine
headline.main: President Says Hundreds of Foreign Tanks in Ukraine

docs.snippet: Ukrainian President Petro Poroshenko, condemning Russian intervention in his country, said on Saturday that there were now thousands of foreign troops and hundreds of foreign tanks in Ukraine....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ukrainian President Petro Poroshenko, condemning Russian intervention in his country, said on Saturday that there were now thousands of foreign troops and hundreds of foreign tanks in Ukraine.

headline.print_headline: Turkish President Erdogan Appoints Divisive Aide as Economic Adviser
headline.main: Turkish President Erdogan Appoints Divisive Aide as Economic Adviser

docs.snippet: Newly inaugurated Turkish president Tayyip Erdogan has appointed his close aide Yigit Bulut to be his chief economics adviser, his office said on Saturday, a move likely to alarm investors already concerned over the management of the country's fin...
docs.lead_paragraph: Newly inaugurated Turkish president Tayyip Erdogan has appointed his close aide Yigit Bulut to be his chief economics adviser, his office said on Saturday, a move likely to alarm investors already concerned over the management of the country's finances.

headline.print_headline: Egyptian Court Sentences Brotherhood Leader Badie to Life in Prison
headline.main: Egyptian Court Sentences Brotherhood Leader Badie to Life in Prison

docs.snippet: An Egyptian court sentenced Mohamed Badie, general guide of the outlawed Muslim Brotherhood, and seven others to life in prison on Saturday for inciting violence during protests last year, judicial sources said....
docs.lead_paragraph: An Egyptian court sentenced Mohamed Badie, general guide of the outlawed Muslim Brotherhood, and seven others to life in prison on Saturday for inciting violence during protests last year, judicial sources said.

headline.print_headline: EU to Prepare 'Next Level' of Russia Sanctions: Germany's Gabriel
headline.main: EU to Prepare 'Next Level' of Russia Sanctions: Germany's Gabriel

docs.snippet: European Union leaders have agreed to prepare "the next level of sanctions" against Russia in response to its intervention in Ukraine, German Vice-Chancellor Sigmar Gabriel said on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: European Union leaders have agreed to prepare "the next level of sanctions" against Russia in response to its intervention in Ukraine, German Vice-Chancellor Sigmar Gabriel said on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Russian Politician Beaten After Report on Soldier Burials
headline.main: Russian Politician Beaten After Report on Soldier Burials

docs.snippet: A Russian politician said on Saturday he had been badly beaten after publicising the mysterious funerals of two soldiers who may have died while fighting in Ukraine....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Russian politician said on Saturday he had been badly beaten after publicising the mysterious funerals of two soldiers who may have died while fighting in Ukraine.

headline.print_headline: Russian Tanks Flatten East Ukrainian Town, Ukraine Military Says
headline.main: Russian Tanks Flatten East Ukrainian Town, Ukraine Military Says

docs.snippet: Ukraine's military said on Saturday its forces had pulled out of areas to the east of the border-area city of Luhansk under pressure from Russian-backed rebels and that Russian tanks had been used to "destroy virtually every house" in one small to...
docs.lead_paragraph: Ukraine's military said on Saturday its forces had pulled out of areas to the east of the border-area city of Luhansk under pressure from Russian-backed rebels and that Russian tanks had been used to "destroy virtually every house" in one small town.

headline.print_headline: Death of Man After New York Police Restrain Him Ruled a Homicide
headline.main: Death of Man After New York Police Restrain Him Ruled a Homicide

docs.snippet: The death of a man who was restrained by police during a drug-fueled outburst was ruled a homicide by the city's medical examiner, New York police said, as the department faces accusations of overly harsh arrest tactics....
docs.lead_paragraph: The death of a man who was restrained by police during a drug-fueled outburst was ruled a homicide by the city's medical examiner, New York police said, as the department faces accusations of overly harsh arrest tactics.
